original_title: 超英雄祭 KAMEN RIDER × SUPER SENTAI LIVE & SHOW 2014
overview: January 15, 2014 was the first time in history that the Kamen Rider & Super Sentai series held a live performance at Nippon Budokan! The special event delivered talks by the casts of "Kamen Rider Gaim" and "Zyuden Sentai Kyoryuger", and live music by artists who excite the Kamen Rider & Super Sentai series.
title: Super Hero Festival: Kamen Rider x Super Sentai Live & Show 2014
